005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
015
016import java.time.Duration;
017import java.time.ZoneId;
018import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-implicit-timezone">fn:implicit-timezone</a>.
026 */
027public final class FnImplicitTimezone {
028  private static final String NAME = "implicit-timezone";
029  @NonNull
030  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
031      .name(NAME)
032      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
033      .deterministic()
034      .contextDependent()
035      .focusIndependent()
036      .returnType(IDayTimeDurationItem.type())
037      .returnOne()
038      .functionHandler(FnImplicitTimezone::execute)
039      .build();
040
041  private FnImplicitTimezone() {
042    // disable construction
043  }
044
045  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
046  @NonNull
047  private static ISequence<IDayTimeDurationItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
048      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
049      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
050      IItem focus) {
051    return ISequence.of(fnImplicitTimezone(dynamicContext));
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Implements <a href=
056   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-implicit-timezone">fn:implicit-timezone</a>.
057   *
058   * @param dynamicContext
059   *          the dynamic evaluation context
060   * @return the current date
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  public static IDayTimeDurationItem fnImplicitTimezone(@NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
064    ZonedDateTime now = dynamicContext.getCurrentDateTime();
065    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(
066        Duration.between(
067            now,
068            now.withZoneSameLocal(ZoneId.of("UTC")))));
069  }
070}
